content.text:
[@SoapDog](@gaQw6z30GpfsW9k8V5ED4pHrg8zmrqku24zTSAINhRg=.ed25519) 

It looks like you're on [`ssb-markdown@^4.0.1`](https://github.com/soapdog/patchfox/blob/3f76283df741f93cbf1062f97971d62d53827981/package.json#L69), so `npm update` only updates you to other versions under 4.x.x.

Could you try `npm install --save ssb-markdown@5.1.3` and see if that updates you? The backward-incompatible change is that now capturing both emoji (`â˜•`) and emoji shortcodes (`:coffee:`) whereas previously we were only parsing the shortcodes. More details [here](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-markdown/pull/37).
